verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>. For in a night <S%H3915><s%> Ar <S%H6144><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is laid waste <S%H7703><s%>, and brought to nought <S%H1820><s%>; for in a night <S%H3915><s%> Kir <S%H7024><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is laid waste <S%H7703><s%>, and brought to nought <S%H1820><s%>.

They are gone up <S%H5927><s%> to Bayith <S%H1006><s%>, and to Dibon <S%H1769><s%>, to the high places <S%H1116><s%>, to weep <S%H1065><s%>: Moab <S%H4124><s%> waileth <S%H3213><s%> over Nebo <S%H5015><s%>, and over Medeba <S%H4311><s%>; on all their heads <S%H7218><s%> is baldness <S%H7144><s%>, every beard <S%H2206><s%> is cut off <S%H1438><s%>.

In their streets <S%H2351><s%> they gird <S%H2296><s%> themselves with sackcloth <S%H8242><s%>; on their housetops <S%H1406><s%>, and in their broad <S%H7339><s%> places <S%H3213><s%>, every one waileth, weeping <S%H1065><s%> abundantly <S%H3381><s%>.

And Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> crieth <S%H2199><s%> out <S%H500><s%>, and Elealeh; their voice <S%H6963><s%> is heard <S%H8085><s%> even unto Jahaz <S%H3096><s%>: therefore the armed men <S%H2502><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> cry aloud <S%H7321><s%>; his soul <S%H5315><s%> trembleth within him <S%H3415><s%>.

My heart <S%H3820><s%> crieth out <S%H2199><s%> for Moab <S%H4124><s%>; her nobles <S%H1280><s%> flee unto Zoar <S%H6820><s%>, to Eglath <S%H5697><s%> - shelishi-yah <S%H7992><s%>: for by the ascent <S%H5927><s%> of Luhith <S%H3872><s%> with weeping <S%H1065><s%> they go up <S%H4608><s%>; for in the way <S%H1870><s%> of Horonaim <S%H2773><s%> they raise up <S%H5927><s%> a cry <S%H2201><s%> of destruction <S%H7667><s%>.

For the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Nimrim <S%H5249><s%> shall be desolate <S%H4923><s%>; for the grass <S%H1877><s%> is withered away <S%H3001><s%>, the tender grass <S%H1877><s%> faileth <S%H3615><s%>, there is no green thing <S%H3418><s%>.

Therefore the abundance <S%H3502><s%> they have gotten <S%H6213><s%>, and that which they have laid up <S%H6486><s%>, shall they carry away <S%H5375><s%> over the brook <S%H5158><s%> of the willows <S%H6155><s%>.

For the cry <S%H2201><s%> is gone round about <S%H5362><s%> the borders <S%H1366><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>; the wailing <S%H3215><s%> thereof unto Eglaim <S%H97><s%>, and the wailing <S%H3215><s%> thereof unto Beer-elim <S%H879><s%>.

For the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Dimon <S%H1775><s%> are full <S%H4390><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%>; for I will bring <S%H7896><s%> yet more <S%H3254><s%> upon Dimon <S%H1775><s%>, a lion <S%H738><s%> upon them of Moab <S%H4124><s%> that escape <S%H6413><s%>, and upon the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the land <S%H127><s%>.
